doc.title: My Secret Life
doc.plot: The sexuality of the Chevalier D'Eon has remained a source of debate since his fall from political power in the late 1700's. Based on the memoirs and the dramatic life journey of the French Diplomat and self professed hermaphrodite, My Secret Life chronicles the tragic downfall of this 18th Century political leader whose inner truth and strength prevail whether dressed as a man or a woman.
